findings.title: PVE-001: Timely accumulateReward() in MasterChefV3::onERC721Received()
findings.description: The `MasterChefV3` contract's `onERC721Received()` function needs to timely invoke `LMPool.accumulateReward()` to update the accumulated reward per share before updating the `UserPositionInfo` of the `_tokenId`, otherwise, users may gain unexpected `CAKE` as a reward.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: Privileged `owner` account has critical role in governing and regulating protocol-wide operations, potentially allowing a compromised account to modify sensitive system parameters.
